Name: Trapped on Monster Island
About the game: Forced to work on a passenger ship as a servant, Eris finds herself praying for a way out of her situation. When one fateful day, she finds her prayers answered, the results are not what she bargained for. The ship is unexpectedly struck by a powerful storm, causing it capsize. The next thing she knows, she awakes on a mysterious island. What brought her here, and for what purpose? Eris must begin exploring the island to find out. Features: Classic turn-based RPG Explore a mysterious island Battle monster to become stronger Gather seeds to power up
